tool_description: Extracts and structures financial statement data from various formats into standardized categories for valuation analysis.

financial_statements.description: Array of financial statement file paths or identifiers

company_name.description: Name of the company being analyzed

reporting_currency.description: Primary reporting currency (USD, EUR, GBP, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid file format: Financial statements must be in supported formats (PDF, Excel, CSV, XML).
Missing required statements: At least income statement and balance sheet are required.
Currency mismatch: All statements must be in the same reporting currency or conversion rates provided.
Invalid fiscal year end: Date must be in valid ISO 8601 format.
usage: Provide paths to financial statement files along with company details. The tool will extract and standardize financial data into consistent categories.

periods_extracted.description: List of fiscal periods successfully parsed
